Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a pair in a small remnant forest patch amid sugarcane. Male (seen well) perched about 1-2m up in dense understory with grass. Female seemed to be about 20-30m away from male.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Vireo olivaceus,Coereba flaveola,Todirostrum cinereum,Chiroxiphia pareola,Myrmotherula luctuosa
